Class ProductionImpl

java.lang.Object
  core.grammar.ElementImpl
      core.grammar.ProductionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, Production
public class ProductionImpl
extends ElementImpl
implements Production

Class that offers a concrete implementation of the interface Production. It belongs to the Public API.

Author:
Jorge Couchet.

addRightElement

public boolean addRightElement(Element e,
                               int pos)
Description copied from interface: Production
Insert the symbol that is in the position pos at the right side of the Production. Returns TRUE if is possible insert the Element at the position pos, FALSE otherwise.

Specified by:
addRightElement in interface Production
Parameters:
e - The symbol that is at the right side of the Production.
pos - The absolute position (starting in 1) of the symbol at the right side of the Production.

public NonTerminal getLeft(Grammar g)
Specified by:
getLeft in interface Production
Parameters:
g - The Grammar associated to the Production. Returns the NonTerminal symbol that is in the left side of the Production. It does not belong to the Public API.

getNonTerminalsRight

public java.util.Collection<NonTerminal> getNonTerminalsRight(Grammar g)
                                                       throws GrammarExceptionImpl
Specified by:
getNonTerminalsRight in interface Production
Parameters:
g - The Grammar associated to the Production. Returns a collection with the NonTerminals that are at the right side of the Production. Throws a GrammarException if it isn´t possible to add a NonTerminal to the Collection. Return NULL if there aren´t symbols at the right side.
Throws:
GrammarExceptionImpl

getTerminalsRight

public java.util.Collection<Terminal> getTerminalsRight(Grammar g)
                                                 throws GrammarExceptionImpl
Specified by:
getTerminalsRight in interface Production
Parameters:
g - The Grammar associated to the Production. Returns a collection with the Terminals that are at the right side of the Production. Throws a GrammarException if it isn´t possible to add a Terminal to the Collection. Return NULL if there aren´t symbols at the right side.
Throws:
GrammarExceptionImpl

getRights

public java.util.Collection<Element> getRights(Grammar g)
                                        throws GrammarExceptionImpl
Specified by:
getRights in interface Production
Parameters:
g - The Grammar associated to the Production. Returns a Collection with all the symbols at the right side with the order preserved. Throws a GrammarException if it isn´t possible to add an Element to the Collection, or if there are NULL elements mixed with non NULL elements at the right side of the Production. Return NULL if there aren´t symbols at the right side of the production.
Throws:
GrammarExceptionImpl

getRightPosition

public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> getRightPosition(Element e)
                                                         throws GrammarExceptionImpl
Description copied from interface: Production
If the Element e belongs to the right side of the Production, then returns an ordered Collection with the positions where the Element appears, oterwise returns NULL. The positions are converted to the absolute position starting at 1. Throws a GrammarException if it isn´t possible to add a position to the Collection.

Specified by:
getRightPosition in interface Production
Parameters:
e - The Element symbol to be checked with the Production.
Throws:
GrammarExceptionImpl
